EmailTemplate.name: Paperwork Request Final
EmailTemplate.subject: One more step to becoming a member of IAVA's Community of Veterans!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for signing up to join IAVA’s Community of Veterans. There’s one more step before you can become a member.
Before we can approve your application, you must submit paperwork verifying your status as an Operation Enduring Freedom (2001-Present) or Operation Iraqi Freedom (2003-Present) veteran.
https://secure.iava.org/veteran-paperwork?tfa_ContactID={!Contact.Id}
Please send us ONE of the following documents in a non-editable format (i.e. PDF or .JPG files):
A copy of your DD214 that shows:
Your discharge status AND: Evidence of a Global War on Terrorism Expeditionary Medal, Iraq Campaign Medal, Afghanistan Campaign Medal, Combat Action Badge OR Clearly stated service dates in Iraq and/or Afghanistan
Officer Records Briefs or Enlisted Records Briefs
Redeployment or REFRAD orders
Medal, Award, or certificate of recognition from your service in Iraq and/or Afghanistan
Paperwork from the Veterans Administration or Department of Defense indicating that you served in Iraq and/or Afghanistan
You can upload a copy of these documents online by clicking: https://secure.iava.org/veteran-paperwork?tfa_ContactID={!Contact.Id}
You can also email, fax or mail a copy to us (including cover letter with your name and the email address you used to register):
Email: paperwork@iava.org
Fax: 646-607-0388 Attn: Community of Veterans
Mail: IAVA Community of Veterans 292 Madison Ave, 10th Floor New York, NY 10003
Once we receive your documents, you’ll be able to join our exclusive online social network, get access to free tickets and giveaways, and get connected to other OIF/OEF veterans in your area.
If you have questions or want to do more, email community@iava.org.
Thank you for getting involved.
Sincerely,
Paul
Paul Rieckhoff Iraq Veteran Executive Director & Founder Iraq and Afghanistan Veterans of America (IAVA)
P.S. Think your friends would want to join IAVA? Send them this message: "I just joined IAVA, the nation’s first and largest organization for veterans of Iraq and Afghanistan. Membership is free! Get free tickets to concerts, movie screenings and network with other OIF/OEF vets. Sign up at www.iava.org/#join
